EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.Job_Applying_For__c} Questionaire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for applying for the {!Lead.Job_Applying_For__c} position with Borrego Solar Systems, Inc.
Please answer the questions in the attached document and forward your answers to hr@borregosolar.com at your earliest convenience. If your experience meets our criteria, we will contact you for an interview.
Once again, thank you for your interest.
Sincerely, Borrego Solar Human Resources
